Dataset: PBCOR_V1.0 (2020-01-01)¶

Category: Covariates

Bias-Corrected Precipitation

Corrected global high-resolution precipitation climatologies.

This dataset contains data with the following attributes:

  • Time Resolution: 1979-2013

  • Spatial Resolution: 1 km

  • DOI: 10.1175/JCLI-D-19-0332.1

  • Link: http://www.gloh2o.org/pbcor/

Environment variables included:¶

$PBCOR_V1.0_HOME Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/PBCOR_V1.0 $PBCOR_V1.0_ROOT Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/PBCOR_V1.0 $PBCOR_V1.0_VERSION Version: 2020-01-01

Tips: - Use echo $ENV_NAME to check the environment value. - To see all environment variables related to PBCOR_V1.0, you can load the module then use: env | grep PBCOR_V1.0 - To unload the module and remove the environment settings: module unload PBCOR_V1.0 ————————————————————-

Environment Variables +————————-+————+ | Variable Name | Value | +=========================+============+ | PBCOR_V1.0_HOME | modroot | +————————-+————+ | RCAC_PBCOR_V1.0_ROOT | modroot | +————————-+————+ | RCAC_PBCOR_V1.0_VERSION | 2020-01-01 | +————————-+————+
